 Formula-building rule for restricted universal quantifier (deduction rule).  (Contributed by NM, 20-Nov-1994.)
statement:
ralbidv.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
ralbidv $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x e. A ps <-> A. x e. A ch ) ) $.
$d ph x $.
